title: Yasou bug? In game freeze?
body: Is anyone else encountering a bug where their computer freezes every time they load onto the rift as Yasuo? And are then forced to manually shut down their computer and power it up again?

replies.body:
Posted this on reddit, guess what happened.



I got downvoted and only had 6 comments, great community huh?
its a bug with yasuo, you dont have to reboot your pc, just alt+f4 and reconnect... only happens when loading with the rest of the players
It's been happening to me ever since the SRVU came out, Riot help.
3 times with yasuo on aram already. yasuo literally breaking the game

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IspiPtGz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-19T03:08:03.458+0000)
>
> Get a better PC.

lol Really? My computer has never done this before. First game I open after yesterday's 8:30-10:30 am maintenance, my computer crashes.
Experienced the same problem, Can say it sucks
I've closed client and reopened it like 5 times now and it's still happening :/ Rito pls
Gotten it twice as yasuo. Ended up closing client and reconecting and its fine.
No, not with yas anyway, a while back i was having the same issue except with rengar and lucian, this was in patch 4.18-4.19 i think
